name: ONYX x LES MILLS: Bring it ON
dateTime: Friday, July 25 Â· 5:30 - 9pm HKT. Doors at 4pm
location: Central Harbourfront Event Space, 9 Lung Wo Rd Central, HKI
about: If you canâ€™t beat the heat, sweat it out! Join ONYX by GO24 Fitness and LES MILLS Hong Kong & Macao for an electric evening of fitness and fun.Punch and kick to classic BODYCOMBAT favourites, and groove with a star-studded BODYJAM instructor ensemble. All are welcome!Admission is complimentary with every purchase of a limited-edition ONYX by GO24 Fitness x LES MILLS Hong Kong & Macao gift pack. Each gift pack includes admission to one class.

name: STATION 9 - Official Hyrox Afterparty (Hong Kong)
location: The Trilogy, 45 Pottinger Street #26/F Hong Kong, HKI
about: Welcome to the Official Hyrox after party!Step into a night where the spirit of Hyrox meets the heartbeat of Hong Kongâ€”a night of celebration, connection, and unforgettable memories waiting to be made.This after party is open to everyone, not just racers! Itâ€™s time to unwind and party with plus ones and fellow competitors, share stories of triumph and struggle, then dance the night away in a high-energy atmosphere.The afterparty will take you on a journey through Hong Kongâ€™s rich culture to its fast paced modern identity, split across different activities throughout the evening. You can expect performances, electric DJ sets including our very own BENNY * CEE, brand activations and epic prizes in which you may be blessed with the opportunity to challenge for.The Trilogy, located in the heart of Central, will play host to the event. With multiple floors, including a stunning rooftop overlooking Hong Kong's iconic skyline, plus an amazing nightclub to keep the celebration going into the early hours. This afterparty is not one to be missed!PLEASE NOTE:*There are also limited nightclub tables availble. If you are interested in booking a table for the evening, please contact info@thetrilogy.hkWe look forward to welcoming you after a hard weekend of Hyrox!(This event is organised in collaboration with the BENNY * CEE brand, for any questions please email benny@bennyxcee.com)

name: SUMMER SWEAT | GIRLSLIFTGIRLS X FORM ATHLETIC
location: FORM Athletic, 1 Wellington Street Hong Kong, HKI
about: Girls Lift Girls is teaming up with Form Athletic again for a summer sweat workout to celebrate the opening of their new gym! Ready to sweat together? Join us for a team-based group workout that combines strength training and conditioning in a supportive, energetic environment.What to ExpectThis indoor session is designed for all fitness levels - from total beginners to seasoned athletes. We'll focus on functional strength movements and cardio conditioning that you can modify to match your comfort zone.Perfect For You If...You want to get a solid sweat session inYou're curious about trying a structured workout for the first timeYou prefer exercising with others rather than going soloThe VibeTeam-based format means you'll be working alongside others, sharing the energy, and maybe making some new connections. Great music, clear instruction, and a judgment-free zone where everyone's just focused on moving their body and having a good time.Duration: 1 hour workout (9:00am -10:00am)Location: Form Athletic (New gym)What to bring: Water bottle, towel, and comfortable workout clothesFee: $100 HKD per person (non-refundable)Spaces are limitedâ€”grab your spot now and letâ€™s lift each other up!ğŸ’¬ Wanna stay in the loop?Join our WhatsApp group for live updates + event details:ğŸ‘‰ https://chat.whatsapp.com/KYznc6wl3wC9jLfsAuediFCanâ€™t wait to see you there ğŸ’ª

name: ITF BT 100 / BT 10 BEACH TENNIS WORLD TOUR @Discovery Bay
location: Tai Pak Beach, Db Hong kong, NT
about: ITF BT100 / BT 10 BEACH TENNIS WORLD TOURWelcome to the ultimate beach tennis showdown at Tai Pak Beach @ Discovery Bay. Join us for a thrilling event featuring the best beach tennis players from around the world competing for the prestigious title. Watch intense matches, enjoy the beautiful beach atmosphere, and soak up the sun while witnessing top-notch beach tennis skills on display. Whether you're a beach tennis enthusiast or just looking for a fun day out, this event is not to be missed. Mark your calendars and get ready for an action-packed weekend of beach tennis excitement!

name: She Runs Collective Run Club
location: THE STATION, 18 Upper Station Street #G/F Sheung Wan, HKI
about: WHERE & WHEN?Meet at The Station. Arrive any time, we start with a group warm-up at 7:30pm.HOW LONG IS THE RUN?Choose from 2km, 4km or 6km or walking, no pressure & your free to change your mind.ITS MY FIRST TIME WHAT SHOULD I DO?Leave your belongings at The Station, find one of our run captains, and say hi! No worries about being left behind â€“ our dedicated female run captains lead the way. After the run, stick around for post-run smoothies, beers, wine & snacks at The Station.For more information, check out our IG @She.Runs.CollectiveDisclaimer & WaiverBy registering for or participating in this event, you confirm that you do so voluntarily and at your own risk. The organisers make no warranties as to safety and accept no liability for any injury, illness, loss, or damage arising from participation. You are solely responsible for assessing your fitness and ensuring your own safety. By attending, you waive all claims against the organisers to the fullest extent permitted by law.
